TopicTitle: external camera views on IVA monitors? howto?

Articles.Content: trying to play through full game, IVA only but would be so much easier with monitors showing camera views, howto?

RPM comes with camera's to place where you want and FASA as 1 and ASET and Hullcam VDS.

EDIT- Be sure to set or check the camera # and there not all the same.
